div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xvijo mensis Septem Octobris anno quo supra

Alexander rede Willelmus blinsele Willelmus Wormet thomas Waus
Duncanus Colisone Willelmus portar malcomus crag Johannes arthour
Johannes thomsone Richardus Waus Junior Willelmus colp patricius
Rede patricius chernside Alexander scrogis et Johannes crukschank burgenses
Jurati dicunt quod quondam magister Andreas bisset frater Johannis bisset
latoris presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem
et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra tam anteriore quam Interiore cum
suis pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis Duncansone ex australi ex vna
et terram Elizabeth' blinsele ex boreali partibus ab altera et communes
vias regias versus oriens et occidens Et quod dictus Johannes
est legittime et propinquior heres dicti quondam magistri Andree fratris suj de
dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis
valet nunc per annum viginti s' et valuit xiij s' et iiijor d' tempore pacis
Et quod tenetur in capite de Supprimo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium
Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri regis per Spacium trium mensum
aut eocirca per decessum dicti quondam magistri Andree fratris suj In defectu
virj heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis datis et clausis et cetera

The saide day masitir thomas chamer forspekar for Alexander hay saide that
he sulde preiwe the aithe that malcome of crag hed' maid'
befor ane assis' of nayne availe quhene he suer' that he said'
nocht that that Alexander hay tuk out woll of his nychtbouris sek and put
It in his avne sek

decimo septimo die mensis februarij anno quo supra hoc presens Actum
Immediate precedenti de mandato magistri thome chamer annullatur
quia ex posuit se premisse retulisse ex senistra Relacione male
auisiata et nichil nouit dicto malcomo nichil fidelitatem ex se et cetera Et vtriusque
pars alteri remisit iniurias In premissa et certa ea et cetera

The saide day Johne thomsone follouit Johne Arthour be ane borghe'
that he wranguislie hede merkit ane barrell of tar' of his quhilkis
borghe' the saide Johne denyit and in continent it was put to the
decisioun' of ane assis' quhilkis riplie auisit deliuerit and fande
the saide borghe' of nane avale be the moutht of Williame
blinsel forspekar for the quhilkis the saide Johne thomson' was in
ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and the saide Johne arthour' quyt of the said'
clame

The said' day Johne nicholson' yongar conuict' be ane Suorne assis'
William blinsele forspekar for strubulance of marioun' fraser Ande the
saide marioun' conuict' for strubulance of the saide Johne

The saide day Johne nicholson' was conuict' be ane Suorne assis'
Williame blinsel forspekar for strubulance of James bervy for the
quhilk he was in Ane amerciament of the court et cetera

The saide day Johne thomsone allouit thre barrellis of tare
quhilkis he bocht fra george the Estlyne and resauit and pait
for thame

The said' day Johne thomsone saide that Johne Arthour wranguislie
hed' merkit ane barrell of tare of his with his merk

The saide day Williame huntar grauntit that he was feit with thome
chepman for ane yer' fra the fest of pasche nixt hereftir furtht for tene
s' and he grantit him aving to the saide thomas vj s' of maile

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxjo
die mensis Octobris anno quo supra

The saide day Androw litstar follouit canny gilespy for xj s' and v d' and
scho grantit hir' awing him v s' quhilkis the balyeis chargit hir'
to pay within terme of law and he tuk to preiwe this day viij dais
that scho is aving to him the Rest of the saide money
The saide day Alexander hay was in ane Amerciament

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis has assignit to Alexander
prat friday the secund day of the monetht of Decembir
nixt to cum to preiwe Sufficientlie befor thame in the tolbutht of Abirdene
that the Siluer belt follouit be Dauy colp tutor to the ayr'
of vmquhill William buchane was laid' to him in wede
of the franche crovnis and of ij peter of woll et cetera becaus' the saide Alexander allegit
part of his previs beyond fortht

Eodem die Dauid colp fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Willelmum
colp and thomam Waus coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores ad prosequendum
Alexandrum prat pro argentea vno coclearj ac pro forma terre quam
Inhabitat et cetera Agendum defendendum Ac in omnibus aliis causis etr actionibus
ipsum continens promittens de Rato et grato cum ceteris terminis et clausulis
necesseriis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die
mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The saide day margaret Kintor was conuict be ane Suorne assis'
alexander rede forspekar for the wranguis' haldin of sex s' fra Johne
Wormet Ande the saide Johne was conuict be the saide assis'
the saide Alexander Rede forspekar for the wranguis' haldin of vj s' fra
the saide margaret for ane cobilhir' Ande Ilkan to pay vthiris
et cetera and the saide margaret pait the saide sex s' to the balyeis one the
common kyst quhilkis the balyeis offerit to the saide Johne and
he refusit it

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day viij dais
the last day of Octobir to Johne Wormet tile ansuer peremptourlie
to the borghe' fundin one be gilbert prestone for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of v s'

The saide day Williame goldsmitht grantit aving to marion' Ranalde
xij s' to be pait within xv dais

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem quarto die nouembris Anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday the vij day
of nouember' to the wif of thomas hay to preiwe the
gudis of airschip clamit be hir' and William Wormet hir'
forspekar being in the handis of margaret hay gevin
in bill pertening to hir saide Spous' and hir in his nayme

The saide day Eby Ruthirfurde megy mortymer the wif
of philp clerk the wif of Androw smitht the wif
of nicholl bevmond' Maky Walcar the wif of Johne
Sclatar the wif of henry lorne Johne blak in his wifis
name be thar toungis grantit Ilkane of thame in ane
amerciament of the courtis fo Spilling of the mercat in bying
of meile et cetera the wif of Johne fynne the wif of Johne
blak in the Schipraw and marione feynneir conuict' be ane
Suorne assis' patry rede forspekar for spilling of the mercat
in bying of meile et cetera and Ilkane of thame in ane Amerciament of
the court et cetera Ande the balyeis chargit the officiaris to tak law
borrouis of ale the saide personis that the mercat be nocht
Spilt be thame quhile michaelmes day nixt to cum vndir
the pane of law

The saide day Alexander hay and Jonhne portar was ilkan in ane Amerciament
becaus' thai war' lauchfullie warnit and nocht comperit to ansuer to
malcum cragis for the entiring of ane landeman and Jhonn portar for fraucht

The saide day Dauid treis' was conuict be ane assis' patry rede
forspekar for strubulance of goddis saynde et cetera and to pay demi barrell wax
to the haly blude licht et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi ed Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto
die nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day Johne tulibo grantit him to warande the
covntour laid' be hin in wede to Alexander prat quhile he be
pait of xl s' Scottis money

The saide day Johne portar grauntit and oblist him to
pay to malcum of crag the fraucht aving be thome
moir' be friday cum viij dais Sanct Katherynnis day

The saide day the balyeis ordanit Androw nachtj seriend' to pas' and
warne Johne thomsone to comper' befor tham one monunday
the xiiij day of this Instant monetht of nouembir to ansuer
perempturlie to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne arthour for the
wranguislie haldin fra him of ane barrell of tar'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xiiij die Nouembris Anno quo supra

The saide day William Smitht grantit that he sulde ansur for
margaret hay his wyff

The saide day thome talyour in futy grantit him aving to William
Wormet fyftj Schillingis quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to
pay within terme of law

The saide day Duncan portar allegit that canny Walcar' was
his feit seruand' and scho accusit be hir' aithe grantit scho
saide yhey to him

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio dicti burgi futy xvj
die nouembris anno quo Supra videlicet quingentesimo secundo

The said' day William scrimgeour grantit that he hede
xvj s' and j d' in his handis of Sanct clementis siluer

The saide day It was fundyn be ane Suorne Inquest
that ser Duncan nachtj resauit v s' of Sanct clementis
offerand' the last Sanct clementis day

The saide day Jonhne of Retre follouit maly Anthone for the wranguis'
hurting and skauding with hat wattir of Joky narne sone to Richerde
narne in William goldsmithis hous' quhilkis the said' marioun denyit
And' in continent thareftir with Consent of batht the said partiis the said'
actioun' was put to the determinacioun' of ane Suorne assis' of the best and wor
thiast burges of the saide burghe present for the tyme quhilkis riplie auisit
the gret aithe Suorne the richtis resonis' and allegacionis' and witnes and preuis of batht
the said' partiis herde seyne and vndirstandin fand' and deliuerit ale in ane voce
concordand' thai the said' maly Anthone quyt and fre of ale skatht
trubulance skauding andbyrning of the said' Joky narne be the said' mouth
of alexander chamer forspekar of the said' assis' and that was gevin for dome
be the moutht of alexander Jofray dempstar of the saide court

Burgenses et fratres gilde facti tempore prepositure Alexander menyeis anno
Domini Millesimo quingentesimo secundo
Johannes Comes de mar et gareauche gracia prepositi et consilij receptus fuit
in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento sed dispensatus
fuit Cum eo de lott an Scott waik and warde
Johannes dominus forbes recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento
Jacobus crichtone de frendracht miles Recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde quo supra
Alexander bannermane de Wattartone recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde ut supra
georgius leithe de bernis recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento ut supra et cum eisdem dispensatus fuit ut supra
Willelmus leslie de balquhan Jure patris recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde et cetera
Thomas glenny allutarius ad Instanciam magistri mathei pecok
recipitur in liberum burgensis prestito Solito Juramento et Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Johannes lyntone Scissor gracia consilij recipitur in liberum
burgensis prestito Solito Juramento ut Soluet xv s' pro quo Walterus strathathin deuenit plegius
Johannes Wischeart allutarius gracia consilij recipitur in liberum
burgensis prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluet
Johannes Watsone per prepositum consilium et decani gilde recipitur in liberum
burgensis et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et Soluet xl s'
Moricius fergusone Recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et Soluet xl s' et due marce Remittunttur
ad Instanciam Alexandri Rede
Dauid cristesone Recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Jurmaneto et Soluet quinque marcas
Thomas tarvas' recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluet quinque marcas
henricius Andirsone recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde
et Soluet quinque marcas prestito Solio Juramento
Johannes craik gracia prepositi decanorum gilde ac Consilij recipitur in
liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et Soluet quatuor marcas
Robertus moyses Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem
gilde prestito Solito Juramento et Soluet quinque s' in alba bursa
Andreas bavne Jure paternitatis liberum burgensis prestito Solito Juramento
et Soluet quinque s' in alba bursa
georgeus sadlar' Recipitur in liberum burgensem Jure paternitatis prestito solito
Juramento et soluet quinque s' in alba bursa
Dauid lame Recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde Soluet quatuor marcas
ac prestito Solito Juramento /
Thomas Dauisone Recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde
ad requestam magistri Alexandri masse Soluet xl s' prestito solito Juramento
Johannes richardsone recipitur in liberum burgensis et fratrem gilde prestito solito
Juramento ac Soluet
Alexander nory recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit filiam burgensis gracia consilij
prestito Solito Juramento et Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Patricius ponte scissor gracia consilij recipitur in liberum burgensis quia sponsauit
et Soluet decem s' infra hinc et festum pentecostes prox' futur' prestito solito Juramento plegius
thomas leslie
